comment.body:
> @Zeop87 Hello. This domain is a tracking domain, as far as I can see the site itself is not blocked. Please send us the page where the link is located so that we can verify that it is not tracking or advertising. Or unblock this domain in the user's DNS rules:
> 
> `@@||l.bfmtv.com^`
> 
> username is not active

Hello
the link is a link from a Facebook page of a French media. 
I don't understand why, despite the filter, it doesn't work. I don't have any other requests blocked on AdGuard app. 
Are there blocked requests that do not appear on the application?

issue.title: winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: javascript
labels.description: Pull requests that update Javascript code

issue.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.
